app.title: Supplementary Materials
app.p: The following are available online at https://www.mdpi.com/2223-7747/10/2/394/s1. Figure S1: Accumulated tomato yield over time from Meloidogyne incognita infested plants after treatment with NEMguard ® DE from two consecutive years (A = 2019 and B = 2020). Table S1: Tomato plants root weight and second stage juveniles hatched from roots grown for 59 days in Meloidogyne incognita infected soil treated with NEMguard ® DE as single (NEMguard 1) and repeated application (NEMguard 2). Table S2: Tomato yields from Meloidogyne incognita infested plants after treatment with NEMguard ® DE from two consecutive years.
